title: Fantastic Karthus Characterization
body:
I just wanted to say thank you to CarnivalKnights for doing such a fantastic job with Karthus in the High Noon color story. You really captured his specific kind of horror where he genuinely thinks he's helping, but is horribly, horribly wrong. And the DEMON was afraid of him. How cool is that?

Also I like that you left his "death" ambiguous.

replies.body: Thanks! Karthus is one of my favorite characters, so I wanted to make sure I did his High Noon counterpart justice.
But since this is a story for a skin line, it's not canon. Right?
I think it only applies to the "universe" that the skin line's in, but it's still really cool.

Karthus has always been one of my favorite champions, and this story definitely represents him well!
The demon being afraid of him was a good touch, makes me wonder...

I figure the demon's afraid that Lucian will end up chilling out in a literal ghost town forever. If he does, the demon can't take over his body and go destroy people with it. Plus Karthus seemed to be able to both detect and temporarily pacify it, which would definitely put a wrench in whatever plans it has.
